sentences.en: A cement mixer agitates the cement until it is ready to pour.
sentences.cn: 水泥搅拌机把水泥搅动得可以倒出来用为止.

sentences.en: A puppy stepped in the fresh cement.
sentences.cn: 一只小狗踩在刚抹好的水泥面上。
水泥是由石灰石制成的.

sentences.en: Concrete is composed of cement, sand and gravel mixed with water.
sentences.cn: 混凝土由水泥 、 砂、石子与水掺和而构成.

sentences.en: He had spent several hours mixing cement.
sentences.cn: 他花了几个小时搅拌水泥。
咱们来把这些部件粘接在一起吧.

sentences.en: Mix the water into the cement until you get the right consistence.
sentences.cn: 用水搅拌水泥,直到你认为合适的稠度为止.

sentences.en: Most artificial joints are cemented into place.
sentences.cn: 绝大部分人造关节是被黏结复位的。

sentences.en: Nothing cements a friendship between countries so much as trade.
sentences.cn: 没有任何东西能比贸易更能巩固国家间的友谊了。
石头和水泥凝固得很牢.

sentences.en: The administration's position on taxes was set in cement despite the unfavorable public response.
sentences.cn: 尽管公众舆论反对，政府在税收上的立场仍是坚如磐石

sentences.en: The cement plant is going full blast.
sentences.cn: 水泥厂正大力发展生产.

sentences.en: The earth-moving trucks and cement mixers lay idle.
sentences.cn: 运土卡车和混凝土搅拌机闲置着。

sentences.en: The gym teachers lined us up against the cement walls.
sentences.cn: 体育老师让我们靠着水泥墙排好。

sentences.en: They surfaced the walls of the house with cement.
sentences.cn: 他们在房子的四壁抹上一层水泥.

sentences.en: We need 100 tons of cement at most for this project.
sentences.cn: 这项工程满打满算有一百吨水泥就足够了.

words.tran_cn: 胶结的，有粘结性的；似水泥的

phrases.tran_cn: 水泥熟料；水泥熔渣；水泥烧块
坚定的，下定决心的；不可动摇的
波特兰水泥，硅酸盐水泥，普通水泥

trans.tran_en: a grey powder made from  lime  and clay that becomes hard when it is mixed with water and allowed to dry, and that is used in building
to make a relationship between people, countries, or organizations firm and strong

trans.tran_cn: 黏结， 胶合； 巩固， 使团结
trans.tran_en: to make a relationship between people, countries, or organizations firm and strong
